# Mathematical Constants

| Name | Formula | Value to 1000 decimal places |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Square Root of `2` | `√2` | `1.` |
| Half of Square Root of `2` | `(√2)/2` | `0.` |
| Square Root of `3` | `√3` | `1.` |
| Half of Square Root of `3` | `(√3)/2` | `0.` |
| Square Root of `5` | `√5` | `2.` |
| Half of Square Root of `5` | `(√5)/2` | `1.` |
| Square Root of `6` | `√6` | `2.` |
| Half of Square Root of `6` | `(√6)/2` | `1.` |
